body.name: Filtrete Smart Air Purifier & Air Quality Monitor for Large Rooms, up to 310 sqft, Alexa enabled, Wi-Fi Simple Setup, True HEPA Filter for Allergens, Dust, Bacteria, & Viruses, Alexa smart reorders
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 17 mins
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 17 mins
features: DESIGNED WITH AUTO-MODE to clear your air automatically, electronic touch controls, light dimmer and filter life indicator that shows the percentage left on your filter’s life

INCLUDES TRUE HEPA filtration out of the box to attract and capture 99.97% of unwanted airborne particles, such as allergens, dust, lint, mold spores, bacteria, viruses and pet dander (as small as 0.3 microns, from the air passing through the filter media. Initial efficiency value)
DUAL-STAGE FILTRATION: Includes two washable pre-filters to help capture larger particles. Clean every 30 days to maintain optimal device performance
CHANGE FILTER when the device’s filter life indicator reaches 0% (Approximately every 6 months based on 12 hours of run time per day)
BACKED BY 25+ YEARS of filtration expertise
body.description: Looking for some air quality peace of mind? It can be yours with this Filtrete Smart Air Purifier, which is Wi-Fi enabled and automatically monitors and cleans your air 24/7. Plus, the device is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. The Filtrete Smart App will also help you keep tabs on your indoor air quality from your smartphone.

productInformation.name: Warranty Description
productInformation.value: ‎Limited Warranty. This product will be free from defects in material and manufacture for a period of one year from the date of purchase. The user is responsible for determining whether the product is fit for a particular purpose and suitable for user’s application. If this 3M product is defective within the warranty period stated above, your exclusive remedy and 3M's sole obligation shall be, at 3M’s option, to replace the 3M product or refund the purchase price of the 3M product. This warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, or damage resulting from accident, misuse, use of alternate filters, alteration or lack of reasonable care. This warranty gives you specific legal rights and you may have other rights which may vary from state to state or country to country. To obtain warranty service contact 3M at 1-800-388-3458.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breathe easy and save money Save 15% on all Filtrete Smart Air Purifier filter re-orders. Get replacement filters automatically reordered when you need them. No worry. No hassle. Alexa Voice Control Use Alexa voice commands to control your Filtrete Smart Air Purifier. Hey Alexa, how are we breathing today?Hey Alexa, how's the filter life of my Filtrete Smart Air Purifier? Enjoy a seamless setup experience. Filtrete Smart Air Purifiers uses Amazon Wi-Fi Simple Setup technology for easy setup. Link your Filtrete Smart account to Alexa. When it arrives, plug it in and watch it come alive. Improved indoor air quality - True HEPA filtration Many particles are floating in the air that remains unseen to the human eye. With True HEPA Filters included with every Filtrete Smart Air Purifier, you'll help capture 99.97% of airborne particles (as small as 0.3 microns) in your home. Better air. Anywhere. Whether your room is large or small, the Filtrete Smart Air Purifier can help purify the air in them all. Featuring a console device that covers a room up to 310 ft², cleaner air everywhere in room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic air filter
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this purchase! We just bought our third one of these. We liked the first 2 so much that we’re adding a third. It works well and the app is handy. We bought our first one a couple years ago and it’s still working great. We usually keep it in auto mode but do turn the one in our bedroom down to low at night or when we’re watching tv bc it’s right next to our bed. The one in our living room never seems too loud because it’s not right next to our seating. Since it’s so easy to change the speed both with the app and on the filter itself, it’s easy to set it to a level that works for you. The lowest speed is quite quiet and the top speed is a little too noisy for my taste. We buy replacement filters via subscribe and save. We don’t have to replace them TOO often but they are definitely dirty when we do. The filter kicks into a higher speed when our windows are open (and also the time I burned something in the kitchen, ha).The filter seems extremely sturdy and well-made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up to get it running
reviews.reviewText: Nice sized unit that seems well made. Was very easy to set up any sync with my phone. I like the ability to control it with my phone and it provides useful air quality information along with the remaining filter life info too. I would recommend as long as it’s on sale for a decent price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 2nd one not working
reviews.reviewText: Had to send one back as fan wouldn’t run despite light and air quality screen being on…and now after working for a couple of weeks. my other filter is not working as well. I ordered these at the same time as they were 54% off. I see now why on sale. Will be sending this one back, too. The smaller version we have of these in our cabin worked great, but these are a disappointment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Air Purifier - Filtrete is Quickly Becoming a Brand I Can Trust
reviews.reviewText: Quite sleek and tall, this can be mistaken for a premium tower fan. But it does so much more than just blow air - it blows clean air that it purifies, while being able to connect to its app on your phone so you can control it with such if your the lazy type like me and don't want to get off your couch once you've sat down.What I like specifically about the Filtrete are all the smart functions and features, since how can you really tell any other air purifier from another if you're working better or not? But what was cool was when the house next door had their roofing redone and all that clitter clatter of about ten guys kicked up a bunch of particles and particulates in the air. The Filtrete was able to pick up on the air quality, and that helped me out a lot as I was able to close enough windows and turn it on full blast to help control my allergies, which it also magically did since I have the most sensitive nasal allergies.So for me from my own experiences, I'm glad to say both features worked for me, as well as being able to control the purifier with my phone, and for all that it deserves five stars. In the beginning I was hesitant since I feel the price was rather high, and how some generic brand purifiers this size could be found for half the price. But this is the second purifier I have had the pleasure to review, and both have turned out excellent, so I can vouch for the quality of this brand, which in the beginning I have never heard of and also thought it was a generic brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this January 20, 2021. Initially it worked great! It started to make a lot of noise almost nine monthes later. I was disappointed. I contacted the manufacturer through Amazon and they told me to cut the cord on the air purifier then take photos and email a copy of the receipt along with the photos. About 2 weeks later I received a new air purifier. The company was very good with customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We have one in every room
reviews.reviewText: This is the best. It ramps up automatically when there’s cooking or hair sprays or anything in the air that needs to be filtered out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent air cleaner
reviews.reviewText: This is by far one of the best investments I've ever made. I suffer from chronic lung disease, and needed something to keep the air in my 1200 sq ft home clean as I live near the desert and the air is often dusty outside. I've had this air purifier for 8 months, and it has never failed to keep my entire home air pure, even though it's only rated at 310 sq ft. This is a very sensitive system. If I leave my patio door open for a few minutes, even on a calm day, I'll get an alert to my iPhone that the inside air is worsening. Same thing when I cook. I live alone, so for a home with small kids running in and out, could be challenging for this air purifier. But, if you have an ill family member that needs really clean, healthy air, this is the system you want. I also use high performance Filtrete filters in my central heat/ac system, which makes it even better. The app for the iPhone works flawlessly and gives you alerts when it's time to clean the prefilters in the unit, change the bio filters inside, and even tells you when its time to change your central heat/ac system filters. If you want, you can even have it automatically order new filters for you when it's time. It is a beautiful design, and quiet too. Highly recommended!!! Thank you, Filtrete!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this product!
reviews.reviewText: The unit makes a terrible screeching noise and Filtrete/3M has said it is a manufacturing defect. They will not replace or repair as it only has a one year warranty. I would look at other more reputable products instead.
The media could not be loaded. Does what it was intended to do, but a bit noisy even on low speed. Will update my review at a later date to let you know how it's performing.

Purchased in June, 2023. The fan’s bearings are failing and the noise makes the unit unusable. I’ve tried contacting the seller (BMTLiq) but no response. It’s an expensive unit and you’d think it would last longer than 8 months. I give it a single star because I can’t go negative.

Husband is smoker and it keeps smoke away from me. Level 4 of fan is loud and once there is no smoke in house takes hours for it to go back in green. Filter only lasted 6 weeks and while waiting for new filter I tried to clean old one and pressed reset and it said filter is as at 100% which it obviously wasn’t, therefore percentage of filter life is not accurate
works well little louder than expected at top speed but still great
